title: Avery Glue Stick White, Washable, Nontoxic, 0.26 oz. Permanent Glue Stic, 3pk (00164)
features: Glue goes on smoothly minimizing any clumping or wrinkling
White glue bonds properly to a variety of surfaces; paper photos cardboard foam board fabric glass and more
Strong and permanent adhesive but washes easily off hands and clothing
Safe for children; glue sticks are nontoxic acid free ACMI certified and conform to ASTM D 4236
An all-purpose glue perfect for school projects arts & crafts and scrapbooks
description: Confidently apply adhesive to every spot that needs it with this Avery Glue Stic. Simply lift the cap and twist the base for easy application. White glue goes on smoothly, minimizing any clumping or wrinkling, and dries clear. Holds strong with a gentle touch; permanent adhesive bonds securely to a variety of materials but washes easily off hands and clothing. White glue bonds to paper, photos, cardboard, foam board, fabric, glass and more.

Avery Glue Stics are a great acid-free glue to add to any student's school supply list. Whether it's for a school project, arts & crafts, 3d printing, or for a slime kit to make slime, Avery Glue Stics are versatile and can get the job done. Avery Glue Stics are also great during the holidays. Seamlessly put the last finishing touches on your gift wrap or seal the envelope to your custom greeting card with one swipe of your glue stick. All Avery Glue Stics are nontoxic, photo-safe, ACMI certified and conform to ASTM D 4236.
